fields.name: AgentConfiguration
fields.description: The machine configuration of the run agent.

fields.name: Credentials
fields.description: The properties that describes a set of credentials that will be used when this run is invoked.

fields.name: EncodedTaskContent
fields.description: Base64 encoded value of the template/definition file content.

fields.name: EncodedValuesContent
fields.description: Base64 encoded value of the parameters/values file content.

fields.name: Platform
fields.description: The platform properties against which the run has to happen.

fields.name: SourceLocation
fields.description:
The URL(absolute or relative) of the source context. It can be an URL to a tar or git repository.
If it is relative URL, the relative path should be obtained from calling listBuildSourceUploadUrl API.

fields.name: Values
fields.description: The collection of overridable values that can be passed when running a task.
